{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Bennett
|time               = 2023-02-28
|zh                 = 
;今天是班尼特的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''班尼特：'''快看，是宝藏！我们真的找到了宝藏！
:'''派蒙：'''太好了，「班尼冒险团」本次作战顺利结束！
:'''班尼特：'''这一路上真是有惊无险，我差点就被从天上莫名其妙掉下来的巨石砸中了。
:'''派蒙：'''还有半路突然窜出来的野林猪追着我跑…
:'''旅行者：'''这真的叫顺利吗…
:'''派蒙：'''不要在意那些细节嘛！班尼特，快打开宝箱看看吧~
:'''班尼特：'''好，好的！
:'''班尼特：'''…咦？总感觉手心滑滑的。
:'''班尼特：'''可能是我太紧张，出了很多汗吧，哈哈…
:'''旅行者：'''小心！是史莱姆&mdash;&mdash;
|dialogue_review_zh = 「快看，是宝藏！我们真的找到了宝藏！」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Bennett]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Bennett:''' Look, it's treasure! We really found the treasure!
:'''Paimon:''' Yay! Benny's Adventure Team's expedition for today comes to a successful close!
:'''Bennett:''' We really had so many close calls along the way. I nearly got crushed by a huge rock that just randomly fell out of the sky.
:'''Paimon:''' Not to mention the [[Forest Boar]] that started chasing us out of nowhere... 
:'''Traveler:''' Can this really be called a "successful" trip...?
:'''Paimon:''' Don't sweat the small stuff! Quick, Bennett, let's open up the chest and see what's inside~
:'''Bennett:''' O-Okay!
:'''Bennett:''' ...Hmm, why do my palms feel slippery?
:'''Bennett:''' Maybe I'm just sweating because I'm too nervous, haha...
:'''Traveler:''' Careful! It's a [[Slime]]&mdash;
|dialogue_review_en = "Look, it's treasure! We really found the treasure!"
}}
